name: Dicey Kitchen
description:
THE GAME INCLUDS BOTH A BROWSER BUILD AND A WINDOWS BUILD BUT THE LATTER MIGHT BE MORE STABLE!  (LINUX AND MAC BUILDS MIGHT BE  SLIGHTLY OLDER AS WELL)

Welcome to the Dicey Kitchen, the finest restaurant around, serving fresh delicious food all with a smile on our faces!
You are the newest cook on the team, and you're gonna have to slice and dice all manners of food and veg to serve food quickly. Or else the chef won't be happy.

This is our submission for the GMTK2022 Game Jam. The theme was 'Roll of the Dice' (we interpreted the 'Dice' part a bit differently).

  • Use the Left-Click Mouse button to slice and dice the food on your chopping board, quickly but carefully slicing along the coloured lines.
  • Use the Space Key to season your foods for added bonuses, at the cost of losing some time (indicated by the thermometer).
  • Cut up as much goods and slide them away as fast as possible to gather points, until the time runs out. But be warned: the Chef might want to have a word with you once time runs out...
  • Strategically use your knife and your seasoning at the same time to get a high score!

Thank you for playing our entry!
